page.title: 01WESTMINSTER LODGE
page.content: Westminster Lodge Sports Centre is off Holywell Hill. There are two swimming pools there, one large and one small. The large pool is 33.3 metres long and has four diving boards. Its depth is 3.8 metres at the deep end and 1 metre at the shallow end. It is 13 metres wide. The small pool is 13 metres long and 6 metres wide. It has no diving boards and is 0.75 metres deep all over. There is a spectator's gallery overlooking both pools. Also at Westminster Lodge Sports Centre there are rooms for weight training, yoga, karate and general exercising. There is a cafeteria at the Sports Centre which overlooks the park.
